metadata.title: Premium Tech Professional Travel Battery Charger for Nikon EN-EL14 Battery
features: Slim, lightweight design ♦ Smart charging LED indicator
Automatically turns to trickle charge after fully charged ♦ Constant voltage and current charging
Output short circuit and electronic shock protection ♦ Can connect with home/car adapter
Includes universal 110/240V AC power source, European plug, and car adapter
description: plugs directly in to your wall outlet or your car's cigarette lighter and
. The chargers unique flat pin, foldable design allows easy storage and makes it the most compact battery charger on the market!
